description.ruby-sapphire:
Causes a sandstorm that
rages for several turns.
description.emerald:
Causes a sandstorm that
rages for several turns.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A 5-turn sandstorm
that damages all
types except ROCK,
GROUND, and STEEL.
description.diamond-pearl:
A five-turn sand­
storm is summoned
to hurt all combatant
types except Rock, 
Ground, and Steel.
description.platinum:
A five-turn sand­
storm is summoned
to hurt all combatant
types except Rock, 
Ground, and Steel.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
A five-turn sand­
storm is summoned
to hurt all combatant
types except Rock, 
Ground, and Steel.
description.black-white:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned
to hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
description.black-2-white-2:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned
to hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
description.x-y:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned
to hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned
to hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
description.sun-moon:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all
combatants except the Rock, Ground, and
Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all
combatants except the Rock, Ground, and
Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all
combatants except the Rock, Ground, and
Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.
description.sword-shield:
A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all
combatants except Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

effect.full:
Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.  Pokémon that are not ground, rock, or steel take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn.  Every rock Pokémon's original Special Defense is raised by 50% for the duration of this effect.

solar beam's power is halved.

moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis only heal 1/4 the user's max HP.
effect.shortEffect: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.
